attributes.action: bestow the honour of knighthood on the musician Eric Clapton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eric Clapton over a period of some 40 years has provided inspiration and service to the music industry and is internationally recognised as an outstanding musician. As a British Citizen he has contributed greatly to the economy of the UK both as a recording artist and live performer.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Diol1/DoItOnline/DG_4017619
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
